    • Constructor Detail

      • Arena

        public Arena(java.lang.String name)
      throws net.iceball.mga.arena.exceptions.ArenaAlreadyExistException
        Constructor to create an arena, and add them to the loader.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of arena
        Throws:
        net.iceball.mga.arena.exceptions.ArenaAlreadyExistException - when the name of the arena is already exist in the ArenaLoader.

      • Arena

        public Arena(Arena arena,
             java.lang.String newName)
        Constructor the rename the Arena
        Parameters:
        arena - Arena that will be renamed.
        newName - The new name of the arena.

      • Arena

        public Arena(java.lang.String name,
             org.bukkit.Location lobby,
             org.bukkit.Location spectator,
             java.util.List<org.bukkit.Location> blocks,
             java.util.List<net.iceball.mga.arena.team.Team> teams,
             GameStatus status)
        Super constructor for creating Arena instance, used for serialization. In this method, the arena is not added to the ArenaLoader.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of arena
        lobby - Location of lobby
        spectator - Location of spectator
        blocks - List of chest locations
        teams - List of teams
        status - Gamestatus

      • Arena

        Empty constructor used to prevent returning null.

      • addTeam

        public void addTeam(java.lang.String name,
                    int players,
                    net.iceball.mga.arena.team.SpawnType spawnType,
                    int spawns)
             throws net.iceball.mga.arena.team.exceptions.TeamAlreadyExistException
        Adds the team to the teams list.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the team
        players - Maximum amount of players in team
        spawnType - SpawnType of team, can be PLAYER, TEAM or PUBLIC
        spawns - Maximum amount of spawns
        Throws:
        net.iceball.mga.arena.team.exceptions.TeamAlreadyExistException - If the name of the team already exist.

      • deleteTeam

      • getMaxPlayers

        public int getMaxPlayers()
        Gets the maximum amount of players that can be in the arena. It is calculated based of all the teams maximum players together.
        Returns:
        The maximum players that can be in the teams.

      • getTeamNames

        public java.lang.String getTeamNames()
        Gets all the team names in one string.
        Returns:
        All the teams in format: Team1, Team2, etc.

      • serialize

        public void serialize()
               throws net.iceball.mga.arena.exceptions.ArenaNullException
        Saves the arena in the config. If there already exist an arena with that name, the source will be overwritten.
        Throws:
        net.iceball.mga.arena.exceptions.ArenaNullException - When the arena is not ready to be saved.

      • deserialize

        public static Arena deserialize(java.lang.String name)
        Get the arena back from the config.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of arena, used to get it from the config
        Returns:
        Arena instance
